Answer
While ESRS set disclosure requirements, they do not prescribe behavioural obligations in respect
to strategy and policies.
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 95 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
The development of a strategy or policy related to sustainability matters is determined by the
undertaking’s governance bodies.
